title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Advancing Behavioral Health Analytics with Integrated Cloud Services (ARC208)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过集成云服务推进行为健康分析 (ARC208)
abstract: To facilitate and assist Virginians obtain effective and timely behavioral health support before, during, and after a crisis, DBHDS is using the cloud to overcome decades of operational challenges to exchange, secure, and aggregate data from the Commonwealth of Virginia’s network of behavioral and mental health providers. Learn how DBHDS is leveraging AWS and Snowflake to build a modern Enterprise Data Warehouse using a serverless, event-driven architecture to streamline data management, improve data quality, match individuals across multiple health systems, and improve outcomes reporting on critical programs serving vulnerable populations. This presentation is brought to you by Deloitte, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 为了帮助和协助弗吉尼亚州居民在危机发生之前、期间和之后获得有效及时的行为健康支持,DBHDS正在使用云技术来克服数十年来在弗吉尼亚联邦行为和心理健康提供者网络中交换、保护和汇总数据方面的运营挑战。了解DBHDS如何利用AWS和Snowflake构建现代化企业数据仓库,采用无服务器、事件驱动架构来简化数据管理、提高数据质量、跨多个医疗系统匹配个人信息,并改善为弱势群体服务的关键项目的成果报告。本演示由AWS合作伙伴德勤为您呈现。

presenter.name: Robert Osmond
presenter.title: Commonwealth of Virginia Chief Information Officer

presenter.name: Russell Accashian
presenter.title: Chief Information Officer
presenter.company: Department of Behavioral Health and Developmental Services
